name: Fight Of Ninja Warrior
description:
you as a Royal Commander return back to the home, a revolution has been made by the enemy. Enemy has taken down your men and captured a guard castle at the border. Enemy doesn’t consist of an army but an advanced troop has attacked the castle and has taken control.

Most of the enemy soldiers are exhausted and now waiting for the reinforcement. You have a good chance to kill the enemy soldiers before the reinforcement joined the advance troops. Then there will be impossible to take down the whole army.

Fight Of Ninja Warrior: Features

Realistic physics of bow & arrow.
Feel the 3D environment .
Amazing game play.
HD graphics and effects.
Amazing arrow shooting animations.
Different ancient weapons like axes, swords etc.
